alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central St. Lawrence County through 500 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Morristown to near Clayton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rensselaer Falls, Edwardsville, Heuvelton, Hammond, Morristown, De Peyster, Rossie, Jacques Cartier State Park, Chippewa Bay, South Hammond, Nelson Corner, and North Hammond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
